resources.string: If you are part of a group, company or association that provides benefits to its members, we can integrate all the exclusive benefits through Benefy.

Accumulate points or miles according to the policies of each business to redeem for prizes or discounts with which the business values your loyalty and frequency of use. In addition, there is the possibility of acquiring miles or extra points with exclusive promotions.
It participates digitally in the stamp loyalty system. No more cards in your wallet, now you can carry your favorite merchants loyalty cards in the App along with all the other benefits.
Contact us and we will gladly assist you
